name: viny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with long twisting stems that climb, or hang, or grow along the ground, or similar to this: Viny things with large leaves like squash are good to plant with the corn. Some varieties are viney garden beans. English is perhaps the viniest, most invasive of all languages.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tangle of viny vegetation makes the scrubland as difficult to travel through as the jungle.Legumes grown for their soil fertility properties include viny plants.Squash is a viny, creeping and trailing crop with fruits that are considered to be one of the most delicious vegetables.A viny avenue led to a grotto.This species seems to favour dense, viny vegetation.
